nodes.bodyText: This looks like quite a 'serious' password (as opposed to the previous one), are we sure it's supposed to be public? I'm confident this didn't get put out by mistake, but best to make triple sure?
Thanks for checking! This is the same for all of the platform PRs, these were the requested changes.
Yep, this caught me for a second too. Yes all these samples should have hardcoded credentials as per the pattern shown here 👍
Could we put this on one line instead?

Same question about this PW - it looks quite realistic, so not sure if it's supposed to be here? If the PW is public, then there's no need in creating a 'secure' password, viewer01.password would work just as well and would be memorable if a user tries to play with authentication forms?
There's possibly a few more cases like this in the remainder of the files, so I won't comment on those
